name: One Two Galopantes > Chute Alto
notes:
* Balcony Break
* Tech roll to r45 FC on frames 30-31
* Wall crush on block, +20g minimum
* Unparryable by traditional parries, Nina, Asuka, etc
Low crush 7~32
short_notes:

* Unparryable by traditional parries, Nina, Asuka, etc
